definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.chinese: 阿甘是個智商只有75的低能兒。

sentences.english: Are we all so unintelligent that we need an elitist to comment on national affairs?
sentences.chinese: 我們都是些低能兒，需要精英來指點江山？

sentences.english: The consumer is not a moron.
He was born a mentally retarded boy.
She's a professional in work but a novice in love.
sentences.chinese: 對於工作一點不含糊，可是對於戀愛完全是低能兒。

sentences.english: This is true in the tales about the Changeling.
sentences.chinese: 這是無論在對低能兒的故事。

sentences.english: Man is a clever animal who behaves like an imbecile.
sentences.chinese: 人是聰敏的動物表現如低能兒。

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
to whisper to one another's ear
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
shouting abuse in the street like a fishwife
